TypeSignature.Value: public abstract class StringComparer : System.Collections.Generic.IComparer<string>, System.Collections.Generic.IEqualityComparer<string>, System.Collections.IComparer, System.Collections.IEqualityComparer

.class public auto ansi abstract serializable beforefieldinit StringComparer extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.Generic.IComparer`1<string>, class System.Collections.Generic.IEqualityComparer`1<string>, class System.Collections.IComparer, class System.Collections.IEqualityComparer
Public MustInherit Class StringComparer Implements IComparer, IComparer(Of String), IEqualityComparer, IEqualityComparer(Of String)

public ref class StringComparer abstract : System::Collections::Generic::IComparer<System::String ^>, System::Collections::Generic::IEqualityComparer<System::String ^>, System::Collections::IComparer, System::Collections::IEqualityComparer
type StringComparer = class interface IComparer interface IEqualityComparer interface IComparer<string> interface IEqualityComparer<string>

summary.span: 代表使用特定大小寫和文化特性架構或序數比較規則的字串比較作業。

span.span: Represents a string comparison operation that uses specific case and culture-based or ordinal comparison rules.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 物件衍生自類別包含字串為基礎的比較，相等和雜湊程式碼作業，請考慮這兩個案例與特定文化特性的比較規則。An object derived from the class embodies string-based comparison, equality, and hash code operations that take into account both case and culture-specific comparison rules. 您可以使用類別來建立特定型別的比較來排序的泛型集合中的項目。You can use the class to create a type-specific comparison to sort the elements in a generic collection. 這類類別， ， ，以及使用排序用途的類別。Classes such as , , , and use the class for sorting purposes. 比對作業，由區分大小寫或區分大小寫，並使用任一單字 （區分文化特性） 定義類別或序數 （不區分文化特性） 的比較規則。A comparison operation that is represented by the class is defined to be either case-sensitive or case-insensitive, and use either word (culture-sensitive) or ordinal (culture-insensitive) comparison rules. 如需 word 和序數比較規則的詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information about word and ordinal comparison rules, see . > [!NOTE] > 您可以下載[排序權數資料表](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=10921)，該文字檔集合包含在 Windows 作業系統排序及比較作業中使用的字元權數資訊，以及下載[預設 Unicode 定序元素資料表](https://www.unicode.org/Public/UCA/latest/allkeys.txt) (適用於 Linux 和 macOS 的最新版本排序權數資料表)。You can download the [Sorting Weight Tables](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=10921), a set of text files that contain information on the character weights used in sorting and comparison operations for Windows operating systems, and the [Default Unicode Collation Element Table](https://www.unicode.org/Public/UCA/latest/allkeys.txt), the latest version of the sort weight table for Linux and macOS. Linux 和 macOS 上的特定版本排序權數資料表，取決於在系統上安裝的 [International Components for Unicode](http://site.icu-project.org/) 程式庫。The specific version of the sort weight table on Linux and macOS depends on the version of the [International Components for Unicode](http://site.icu-project.org/) libraries installed on the system. 如需其實作的 ICU 版本及 Unicode 版本詳細資訊，請參閱[下載 ICU](http://site.icu-project.org/download)。For information on ICU versions and the Unicode versions that they implement, see [Downloading ICU](http://site.icu-project.org/download). ## 實作的屬性Implemented properties 您可能不清楚如何使用因為紓解矛盾類別內容。You might be confused about how to use the class properties because of a seeming contradiction. 類別的宣告`abstract`(`MustInherit`在 Visual Basic 中)，這表示其成員可只在衍生自類別的物件上叫用類別。The class is declared `abstract` (`MustInherit` in Visual Basic), which means its members can be invoked only on an object of a class derived from the class. 在於每一個屬性的矛盾類別的宣告`static`(`Shared` Visual Basic 中)，這表示此屬性可以叫用不需要先建立衍生的類別。The contradiction is that each property of the class is declared `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic), which means the property can be invoked without first creating a derived class. 您可以呼叫屬性直接因為每一個屬性實際上會傳回衍生自匿名類別的執行個體類別。You can call a property directly because each property actually returns an instance of an anonymous class that is derived from the class. 因此，每個屬性值的型別是，這不是匿名類別的基底類別的匿名型別類別本身。Consequently, the type of each property value is , which is the base class of the anonymous class, not the type of the anonymous class itself. 每個類別屬性會傳回支援預先定義的大小寫和比較規則的物件。Each class property returns a object that supports predefined case and comparison rules. ## Examples 下列範例示範屬性和方法的類別。The following example demonstrates the properties and the method of the class. 此範例說明不同物件排序的三個版本拉丁文字母 I。The example illustrates how different objects sort three versions of the Latin letter I. [!code-cpp[System.StringComparer#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.StringComparer/cpp/omni.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.StringComparer#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.StringComparer/cs/omni.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.StringComparer#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.StringComparer/vb/omni.vb#1)]

span.span: A culture whose linguistic rules are used to perform a string comparison.

summary.span: 建立 物件，以依據指定文化特性的規則比較字串。

span.span: Creates a object that compares strings according to the rules of a specified culture.

returns.span: 新的 物件，會依據 參數使用的比較規則，以及 參數指定的大小寫規則，執行字串比較。

span.span: A new object that performs string comparisons according to the comparison rules used by the parameter and the case rule specified by the parameter.

summary.span: 取得 物件；此物件會使用目前文化特性的字組比較規則，執行區分大小寫字串的比較。

span.span: Gets a object that performs a case-sensitive string comparison using the word comparison rules of the current culture.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所傳回語言相關字串時，就可以使用屬性。The returned by the property can be used when strings are linguistically relevant. 比方說，如果字串會顯示給使用者，或字串是使用者互動的結果，區分文化特性字串比較應該用來排序字串資料。For example, if strings are displayed to the user, or if strings are the result of user interaction, culture-sensitive string comparison should be used to order the string data. 目前的文化特性是與目前執行緒相關聯的物件。The current culture is the object associated with the current thread. 屬性實際上會傳回衍生自匿名類別的執行個體類別。The property actually returns an instance of an anonymous class derived from the class. 每次呼叫屬性`get`存取子會傳回新物件一般，如下列程式碼所示。Each call to the property `get` accessor returns a new object, as the following code shows. [!code-csharp[System.StringComparer.CurrentCulture#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.StringComparer.CurrentCulture/cs/CompareObjects.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.StringComparer.CurrentCulture#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.StringComparer.CurrentCulture/vb/CompareObjects.vb#1)] 若要改善效能，您可以儲存物件中的本機變數，而不是擷取的值屬性多次。To improve performance, you can store the object in a local variable rather than retrieve the value of the property multiple times. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範屬性和方法的類別。The following code example demonstrates the properties and the method of the class. 此範例說明不同物件排序的三個版本拉丁文字母 I。The example illustrates how different objects sort three versions of the Latin letter I. [!code-cpp[System.StringComparer#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.StringComparer/cpp/omni.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.StringComparer#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.StringComparer/cs/omni.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.StringComparer#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.StringComparer/vb/omni.vb#1)]

related.span: 在 .NET 中使用字串的最佳做法

span.span: Best Practices for Using Strings in .NET

Public Shared ReadOnly Property CurrentCultureIgnoreCase As StringComparer
public: static property StringComparer ^ CurrentCultureIgnoreCase { StringComparer ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得 物件，此物件會使用目前文化特性的字組比較規則，執行不區分大小寫字串的比較。

span.span: Gets a object that performs case-insensitive string comparisons using the word comparison rules of the current culture.
A new object for string comparison.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 目前的文化特性與目前執行緒相關聯的物件，它由屬性。The current culture is the object associated with the current thread; it is returned by the property. 所傳回字串是語言相關，但不是兩者的大小寫時，就可以使用屬性。The returned by the property can be used when strings are linguistically relevant but their case is not. 例如，如果字串會顯示給使用者，但就不重要，區分文化特性，不區分大小寫的字串比較應該用來排序字串資料。For example, if strings are displayed to the user but case is unimportant, culture-sensitive, case-insensitive string comparison should be used to order the string data. [!INCLUDE[platform-note](~/includes/c-and-posix-cultures.md)] 屬性實際上會傳回衍生自匿名類別的執行個體類別。The property actually returns an instance of an anonymous class derived from the class. 每次呼叫屬性`get`存取子會傳回新物件一般，如下列程式碼所示。Each call to the property `get` accessor returns a new object, as the following code shows. [!code-csharp[System.StringComparer.CurrentCulture#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.StringComparer.CurrentCulture/cs/CompareObjects.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.StringComparer.CurrentCulture#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.StringComparer.CurrentCulture/vb/CompareObjects.vb#2)] 若要改善效能，您可以儲存物件中的本機變數，而不是擷取的值屬性多次。To improve performance, you can store the object in a local variable rather than retrieve the value of the property multiple times.

related.span: 在 .NET 中使用字串的最佳做法

span.span: Best Practices for Using Strings in .NET

span.span: if and refer to the same object, or and are both the same type of object and those objects are equal, or both and are ; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 因為執行階段並沒有要 unbox`x`或`y`如果其為實值型別，或嘗試向下轉型為`x`或`y`如果它們都是參考類型的字串方法可能比稍微更有效率方法。Because the runtime does not have to unbox `x` or `y` if they are value types or attempt to downcast `x` or `y` to strings if they are reference types, the method may be slightly more efficient than the method.

summary.span: 以衍生類別覆寫時，取得指定之物件的雜湊碼。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, gets the hash code for the specified object.

returns.span: 從 參數值計算所得之 32 位元帶正負號的雜湊碼。

span.span: A 32-bit signed hash code calculated from the value of the parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法的效率高於方法因為`obj`參數沒有 unboxed 執行作業。The method is more efficient than the method because the `obj` parameter does not have to be unboxed to perform the operation. 方法會配置的大小成正比的記憶體數量`obj`若要計算的雜湊碼`obj`。The method allocates an amount of memory that is proportional to the size of `obj` to calculate the hash code of `obj`. 針對大型的字串，會嘗試擷取雜湊程式碼可能會擲回。In the case of large strings, trying to retrieve the hash code can throw an . 相反地，您可以使用替代演算法配置固定的記憶體數量，計算雜湊程式碼時。Instead, you can use an alternate algorithm that allocates a fixed amount of memory when calculating hash codes. 若要使用此演算法，新增[< NetFx45_CultureAwareComparerGetHashCode_LongStrings >](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/netfx45-cultureawarecomparergethashcode-longstrings-element.md)項目[ \](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/runtime-element.md)您的應用程式組態檔區段。To use this algorithm, add the [](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/netfx45-cultureawarecomparergethashcode-longstrings-element.md) element to the [\](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/runtime-element.md) section of your application's configuration file.

exception.span: 記憶體不足，無法配置用來計算雜湊碼所需的緩衝區。

span.span: Not enough memory is available to allocate the buffer that is required to compute the hash code.

exception.span: 記憶體不足，無法配置用來計算雜湊碼所需的緩衝區。

span.span: Not enough memory is available to allocate the buffer that is required to compute the hash code.

summary.span: 取得 物件；此物件會使用不因國別而異的文化特性的字組比較規則，執行區分大小寫字串的比較。

span.span: Gets a object that performs a case-sensitive string comparison using the word comparison rules of the invariant culture.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所傳回屬性以語言相關的方式比較字串，但不適合顯示在任何特定的文化特性。The returned by the property compares strings in a linguistically relevant manner, but it is not suitable for display in any particular culture. 其主要的應用程式是順序的字串將會是跨文化特性相同的方式。Its major application is to order strings in a way that will be identical across cultures. 而異的文化特性所傳回的物件屬性。The invariant culture is the object returned by the property. 屬性實際上會傳回衍生自匿名類別的執行個體類別。The property actually returns an instance of an anonymous class derived from the class. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範屬性和方法的類別。The following code example demonstrates the properties and the method of the class. 此範例說明不同物件排序的三個版本拉丁文字母 I。The example illustrates how different objects sort three versions of the Latin letter I. [!code-cpp[System.StringComparer#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.StringComparer/cpp/omni.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.StringComparer#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.StringComparer/cs/omni.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.StringComparer#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.StringComparer/vb/omni.vb#1)]

summary.span: 取得 物件；此物件會使用不因國別而異的文化特性的字組比較規則，執行不區分大小寫字串的比較。

span.span: Gets a object that performs a case-insensitive string comparison using the word comparison rules of the invariant culture.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所傳回屬性會忽略大小寫，以語言相關方式比較字串，但不適合顯示在任何特定的文化特性。The returned by the property compares strings in a linguistically relevant manner that ignores case, but it is not suitable for display in any particular culture. 其主要的應用程式是順序的字串將會是跨文化特性相同的方式。Its major application is to order strings in a way that will be identical across cultures. 而異的文化特性所傳回的物件屬性。The invariant culture is the object returned by the property. 屬性實際上會傳回衍生自匿名類別的執行個體類別。The property actually returns an instance of an anonymous class derived from the class.

related.span: 在 .NET 中使用字串的最佳做法

span.span: Best Practices for Using Strings in .NET

summary.span: 取得 物件；此物件會執行區分大小寫的序數字串比較。

span.span: Gets a object that performs a case-sensitive ordinal string comparison.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所傳回屬性執行簡單的位元組比較無關的語言。The returned by the property performs a simple byte comparison that is independent of language. 比較字串時，會產生以程式設計方式或比較區分大小寫的資源，例如密碼時，這是最適合。This is most appropriate when comparing strings that are generated programmatically or when comparing case-sensitive resources such as passwords. 屬性實際上會傳回衍生自匿名類別的執行個體類別。The property actually returns an instance of an anonymous class derived from the class. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範屬性和方法的類別。The following code example demonstrates the properties and the method of the class. 此範例說明不同物件排序的三個版本拉丁文字母 I。The example illustrates how different objects sort three versions of the Latin letter I. [!code-cpp[System.StringComparer#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.StringComparer/cpp/omni.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.StringComparer#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.StringComparer/cs/omni.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.StringComparer#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.StringComparer/vb/omni.vb#1)]

summary.span: 取得 物件；此物件會執行不區分大小寫的序數字串比較。

span.span: Gets a object that performs a case-insensitive ordinal string comparison.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所傳回屬性中的字串比較，如果它們已轉換成大寫的使用而異的文化特性的慣例會將這些字元，然後執行 無關的簡單的位元組比較語言。The returned by the property treats the characters in the strings to compare as if they were converted to uppercase using the conventions of the invariant culture, and then performs a simple byte comparison that is independent of language. 比較字串時，會產生以程式設計方式或當比較不區分大小寫的資源，例如路徑與檔案名稱時，這是最適合。This is most appropriate when comparing strings that are generated programmatically or when comparing case-insensitive resources such as paths and filenames. 屬性實際上會傳回衍生自匿名類別的執行個體類別。The property actually returns an instance of an anonymous class derived from the class. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範屬性和方法的類別。The following code example demonstrates the properties and the method of the class. 此範例說明不同物件排序的三個版本拉丁文字母 I。The example illustrates how different objects sort three versions of the Latin letter I. [!code-cpp[System.StringComparer#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.StringComparer/cpp/omni.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.StringComparer#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.StringComparer/cs/omni.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.StringComparer#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.StringComparer/vb/omni.vb#1)]
